summary: Innovative, self-motivated, results-driven software development leader & entrepreneur with over 17 years of experience in designing, building, and deploying software solutions from start-ups to large-scale enterprise solutions. Proven technologist with experience leading multi-functional, multi-site global technology teams building end-user consumer applications, real-time data processing systems serving enterprise customers. Excel at high-growth fast paced environments, leading lean high-performance teams with a drive for building high-value software, delivered through continuous development & deployment.Specialties: Thought leadership- building high performance teams, lean startup execution, building technology strategy and architecting enterprise level solutions, Product strategy, UX design, customer experience with experience in financial, payments, CRM software.
